transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello sir, good evening.
Customer: Good evening, boliye.
Executive: Are sir, ha, hamare internal team se ticket raise hua hai na sir. Wo puchna tha aapse jo aap keh rahe the na ki update karna hai profile mein branch details vagera catalog mein edit karni hai.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Company profile and add branch detail in catalog aisa karke kuch complaint raise ki thi aapne.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ha, ab bataiye sir kya karna hai?
Customer: Ah, nahi mai kar leta hu, catalog se ho jayega na?
Executive: Catalog se ha, ho to jayega lekin karna kya hai sir? Samajh nahi pa rahi hu.
Customer: Usme ek MP Madhya Pradesh ka address dalna tha ek usme.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Matlab Madhya Pradesh ka ek address dalna tha Madhya Pradesh ka MP ka.
Executive: Address dalna tha, to kya GST mein hai wo address?
Customer: GST mein nahi hai, GST mein extra aap pura add kar sakte hai na, extra add hai.
Executive: Ha, add to kar sakte hai aap, ek baar try kijiyega add karne ka.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Add kar sakte hai, mai ek baar check kar le rahi hu, ek second call pe rahiye pata kar leti hu. Shivani madam, ye bataiye ki company profile change karni hai.
Executive: Hello? Company profile bhi change karni hai kya sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi, profile nahi change karna. Usme khali matlab address change karna tha address khali.
Executive: Address change karna hai, ye jo address Aurangabad likha hai wo change karna hai?
Customer: Ha nahi, aur extra jodna tha usme, extra jodna tha alag se.
Executive: Ye wala hai ya dusra hai? Nahi nahi, ye change nahi karna hai, yaha pe ek aur add karna hai.
Executive: Add GST certificate mein jab tak GST certificate mein changes nahi honge na tab tak nahi kar sakte hum. Sir jab tak GST certificate mein aap ek baar GST certificate bhejiye ga hume three page wala. Thik hai, three page wala hai kya abhi aapke paas?
Customer: Nahi thoda mai isme matlab bahar isme. Mai kar lunga change usme, change kar lunga usme.
Executive: To wo hota sir ye hai na ki jo GST mein agar ek aur address add hai to aap yaha pe mention kar sakte ho aur agar nahi hai add ha aur wo khud se add kar sakte hai kya wo keh rahe hai.
Executive: To ho sakta hai aapke side se bhi add nahi hoga sir kyuki GST mein jo add hai wahi add rehta hai. Agar GST mein ek aur aap add kara lete hai to fir wo bhi hum yaha pe add kar sakte hai aur aap bhi add kar sakte hai. Baki aap ek baar try kar lena, thik hai. Waise to jaha tak nahi hoga, thik hai. Dusri cheez sir, ek cheez aur aapse discuss karna tha. Ek second call pe rahiye ga. Ah, abhi haal hi mein kisi buyer se baat aap hui aapki?
Customer: Aaj hui na ek ye Green Dark pvt. ltd hui thi.
Executive: Accha to Green Dark pvt. ltd. Okay, company ki rating review ke liye baat nahi kari tha?
Customer: Nahi rating ka to nahi bheja tha, wo mai baat kar leta hu.
Executive: Bhejiye na sir. Dekhiye aapki company ki jo rating hai na paanch mein ek hai. Matlab ek rating hai sir one only one out of five rating. To sir matlab isse kya hoga na sir ki aapki aapko business mil raha hai, thik hai mil raha hai. Thik hai thoda bahut mil raha hai. But aur accha business aap nikal sakte ho.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Thik hai. To aur accha business nikalne ke liye rating ke liye mai baat karunga, mai baat karunga. Ha listing ranking thoda sa impact padega usse ki taaki thodi si badh jayegi. Aur mai dekh rahi hu buylead jo aapne consume ki thi ah 6 ghante pehle aapne ek pilot coconut plant ki consume ki hai aaj.
Customer: Ha bilkul.
Executive: Ha na sir? To inhi se baat hui hai kya? Detail bhej diya wo. Ha kya bole? Ha baat hui hai, detail unko bhej diya wo detail.
Customer: Detail bhej diya? Columbus coconut powder nahi nahi aaj nahi hui sir.
Executive: Columbus coconut powder coconut plant ki 8 tarikh ko last buylead aapki 8 tarikh ko consume kari hai, 8 tarikh ke baad nahi kari hai sir aapne.
Customer: Nahi aaj bhi ki hai na aaj, aaj aaj bhi ki hai ye aaj.
Executive: Aaj? Nahi sir aaj nahi kari hai, aaj agar kari hoti na to show kar rahi hoti isme.
Customer: Hmm, nahi ki hai aaj mai aapko.
Executive: Ha dekhi hogi ho sakta hai aapne but consume nahi hui kyuki hamare paas record ho jati hai na cheeze sir jo bhi activity karte hai aap. Thik hai aur sir aapne aap to keh rahe the ki TrustSeal ka plan bhi aapne pura bana liya tha fir kya ho gaya sir? Nahi karna hai matlab kab karenge sir? Do din ek ek do ek ya do din ek din ho jayega.
Customer: Aap to sir kab se aapne to humko pura October ke last se baat ho rahi hai aapse October Diwali nahi dekhiye Diwali ke baad bola tha aapne kara lenge. Thik hai Diwali ke baad se aap abhi tak delay kar rahe hai.
Customer: Nahi bas thoda aur humne sir humne to aapko matlab itna accha price kara ke diya matlab mere paas sir 108 client hai 108 client mein humne aapko sabse accha price kara ke diya aur aapki service aapki jo price tha usko dekhiye aapse maine do baar approve karwaya yaani bhang sir ne bhi do baar approve karaya uske baad bhi humne hold karke rakha wo price. Nahi us time thoda payment ka issue tha na mera ye account hai na mera account mein to hai payment aur wo abhi tak wo jitna jo aap chah rahe the matlab waise jo bhi humse accha ho paya sir humne wo sab kara ke diya lekin aapne to fir koi response hi nahi diya.
Executive: Aur isse to sir aapke hi benefit ho jayega sabse accha. Wo CA thoda wo account ko dekh nahi rahe thik se wo dusra change karna padega shayad kyuki wo account mere thoda lock hai na. To aap online chalate hai kya scanner se bhi kar sakte hai aap.
Customer: Nahi hai upar wo ek lock ho rakhi hai upar se wo. Ha to kisi aur agar koi hai aapke janne wale to unke through UPI se aap kara sakte hai jaise hum yaha se IndiaMART ka scanner share karenge aapko aapke whatsapp pe aapko details sab mil jati hai mail pe bhi milegi aapko detail mail pe share kar denge to waha se aap scan karke aap payment kara sakte hai sir.
Customer: Nahi karta hu mai thoda ek ek do ha thoda ek do do teen din ek din ho jayega mera. Sir aap to Diwali ke baad se bol rahe hai do teen din do teen din best deal best price jo tha na sir aapne wo matlab kya bolu mai kho hi diya aapne wo jo aapko us time kara ke diya tha wo aapka ek ek din aise aapne delay kar diya to ab to price thode se badh hi gaye honge.
Executive: Hmm nahi.
Executive: Aap batao dekh lo sir kal ki date mein koi plan ban jaye to kar lijiye kal isse hi kar lete hai.
Executive: Bataiye sir? Kal call kare aapko?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Ha sir? Kya keh rahe hai? Ha mai mai call karunga.
Executive: To kal ha hum aapko detail bhej de kya uski kya price hai aaj ki date mein? Nahi nahi unko change thoda aaj kal price kal morning dijiye ek baar view aa jayega na khate mein to fir ye kar sakte hai aage.
Customer: Sir abhi do do 40 mera do do paacho se baat.
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai?
Customer: Nahi mai kara dunga na thoda ek do teen din rukiye thoda mai kuch setting kar. Agar koi agar dekhiye suniye sir agar koi doubt aa raha hai na to mai account manager hu. Nahi nahi doubt nahi doubt ka to nahi. Mai doubt kuch nahi kuch wo to business to milta hai usme koi issue nahi. Payment to sahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir aapka payment to I think aa gaya hoga aap keh rahe the ki jis beech mein aap keh rahe the October ke last mein ek do din mein aa jayega.
Customer: Nahi sir abhi thoda ek party matlab deal dena matlab material dena baki hai abhi thoda. Mai karta hu na isme kuch karunga.
Executive: Mai to yahi bolungi jab aapko accha khasa business mil raha hai sab kuch nikal ke aa raha hai to business promotion ke liye thoda sa to aapko aage ek step jana hi padega. Thoda sa try karo aapko mai aapko ek baar se bhi bata de rahi hu ki aaj ki date mein aapka kya price hai. Teen minute call pe rahiye ga aap bataiye aapne do baar sir proposal bhi approve kiya tha uske baad bhi pata nahi kya issue hai aapne kiya hi nahi. Nahi payment ka hi thoda sa baki kuch wo fir se do bada bada deal hone wala tha ek bhi nahi ho paya wo unhone unhone agle man ka bata diya the.
Customer: Ab dekhiye ho jayega madam isme kar lunga mai.
Executive: Hello? Thik hai madam mai kar lunga mai.
Executive: Sir aap bataiye kab tak kab tak? Ha mai bataunga na mai bataunga na aapko do teen din. Kab batayenge sir? Ek do teen din kal jane dijiye isme do teen din ho jayega. 23rd kar lenge 23rd final kar lenge.
Executive: Bataiye sir? Okay. 23rd tak. 23rd tak final agar karte hai to hum aapko ekdum sahi price kara ke denge.
Customer: 23rd tak na 23rd tak.
Executive: 23rd tak. Thik hai sir 23rd tak aap. Ha ho jayega 23rd tak ho jayega. Ho jayega 23rd tak. Sir ye hai sir fir ki 23rd ke baad fir aap kahenge ki abhi nahi.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi ho jayega itna time. Do din to. Sir dekhiye hum aapko baki service ka raha buylead ka raha aapse jo banega aap jab call kariyega hum aapko tab service proper provide karenge aapko buylead jo bhi chahiye hoga. Thik hai koi issue try kijiyega 23rd se pehle karate hai to jo bhi voucher pade hai mere paas wo mai aapke catalog mein laga dungi wo offer bhi dila dungi. Thik hai try kijiyega. Mai ek baar na aapko 20 tak connect karungi 20 tarikh tak, thik hai. Baki buylead consume karte rahiye ga, thik hai. Thik hai thik hai. Thik hai thik hai okay sir, thank you. Namaste.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to add Madhya Pradesh address.

- Customer delaying TrustSeal plan.

- Customer's company rating is low.

- Payment issue due to locked account.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to send GST certificate.

- Executive explained about adding address in GST.

- Executive explained benefits of TrustSeal plan.

- Executive offered to share scanner for payment.

- Executive offered to add voucher in catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try to make payment by 23rd.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- address, gst, trustseal, rating, payment
